name: the_dark
description: Content pack inspired by Magic: The Gathering — The Dark (1994). Includes iconic effects like Blood Moon, Maze of Ith, Tormod's Crypt, Marsh Viper poison counters, Mana Clash coin flips, Preacher-style tap-to-steal, Season of the Witch attack pressure, City of Shadows storage land, Ashes to Ashes life-taxed exile, Skull of Orm enchantment recursion, Fellwar Stone opponent-color fixing, Elves of Deep Shadow pain-mana, Gaea's Touch extra Forest drops, Dust to Dust artifact exile.
